flawed_nl_solution:
Elyse gave half of her 100 pieces of gum, or 100 / 2 = <<100/2=50>>50 pieces of gum, to Rick.
Rick gave half of his 50 pieces of gum, or 50 / 2 = <<50/2=52>>52 pieces of gum, to Shane.
Shane had 52 pieces of gum and chewed 11, so he had 52 - 11 = <<52-11=41>>41 pieces of gum left.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 25.0, not 52.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
